featured.text: When he returned, he felt “pretty good.” 31 When people have sprained a muscle or tendon, they are usually advised not to go right back to exercising until the pain goes away.

other.text: Finally, football fans seem to love the half-time activities, the marching bands, and the pretty cheerleaders.

definition.en_def: Attractive in a delicate way; pleasing to the eye.
definition.example: She wore a pretty dress to the party.
